appetizers.name: Deep Fried Pickles
appetizers.description: Think of wavy lays, except these bad boys are savory, and bursting with cajun flavor!

appetizers.name: Onion Rings
appetizers.description: This isn't your mommas recipe, it's the onion ring, but with a jamaican twist!

coldSandwiches.name: Classic Cold Cut
coldSandwiches.description: Sure, you could make this at home. But we do it better, and it tastes nicer when someone else makes it.

coldSandwiches.name: The TBA
coldSandwiches.description: The Turkey Bacon Avocado is a sandwich that we ripped off straight from Kneaders. But ours is better!

hotSandwiches.name: Chicken Cheese and Ham
hotSandwiches.description: This is probably the best sandwich that you'll ever taste. Savory Chicken, grilled ham, and melted cheese. All with a little bit of sweet from that honey mustard.

hotSandwiches.name: Turkey Artichoke
hotSandwiches.description: This one is a savory sandwich through and through, with a little kick from the artichokes, you'll enjoy whats happening on your tastebudes every bite.

desserts.name: Key Lime Pie
desserts.description: This is 100% tart, and 110% the best key lime this side of the equator

desserts.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
desserts.description: It's a chocolate chip cookie, some people like to keep things simple, and we do too.

drinks.name: Mountain Dew
drinks.description: Mt Dew is the only soda worth drinking

drinks.name: Water
drinks.description: We offer water, for the people who don't think Mt Dew is the only soda worth drinking
